title: May Tuesday Be a Fair Fight | Guests: Cassy Garcia & Stewart Whitson | 11/3/22
description:
President Biden held a last-second Hail Mary speech regarding the midterms and democracy. Glenn and Stu review the desperate speech as Glenn points out where the actual threat to democracy lies. The DOJ refuses to release the video of Paul Pelosi’s attack to avoid furthering conspiracy theories, but Glenn reveals the real reason for the suppression of information. U.S. House candidate Cassy Garcia joins to make her case for why she should take the seat of a long-serving Democrat. Stewart Whitson, legal director for the Foundation for Government Accountability, points out how the DOJ’s plan to “protect” voters could lead to disastrous results. How close is America to running out of diesel fuel, which is what every truck uses to supply our stores? 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
